name: Warfare: Tower Defense
description:
Apagio, a fictional Kontinent, is at the brink of war.

More and more areas get invaded. The military forces of Kaspius are aproaching. It is your job as a pilot to take control over a secret prototype of an attack-helicopter, the so called "Wyvern".

Conquer the sky, defend the innocent and build up the ultimate Helicopter to fight back the Enemy.

Features:

  • Hardcore Towerdefense
  • Different  levels
  • Bullet-hell action
  • Upgrade Mechanics
  • Dynamic Enemy Difficulty
